1: // example of a code in MinJ
2: class Average
	2: Keyword	name = class
	2: Identifier	name = Average
3: }
	3: Terminal	name = }
4: //a sample program. It calculates the average of several numbers,
5: // the first value gives how many numbers are to be read
6: void main() //the main method
	6: Keyword	name = void
	6: Keyword	name = main
	6: Terminal	name = (
	6: Terminal	name = )
7: }
	7: Terminal	name = }
8: int n,ave;
	8: Keyword	name = int
	8: Identifier	name = n
	8: Terminal	name = ,
	8: Identifier	name = ave
	8: Terminal	name = ;
9: n=In.int();
	9: Identifier	name = n
	9: Assign	name = =
	9: Identifier	name = In
	9: Terminal	name = .
	9: Keyword	name = int
	9: Terminal	name = (
	9: Terminal	name = )
	9: Terminal	name = ;
10: if (n > 0)
	10: Keyword	name = if
	10: Terminal	name = (
	10: Identifier	name = n
	10: RelOp	name = >
	10: Number	name = 0
	10: Terminal	name = )
11: }
	11: Terminal	name = }
12: int total = sum_int(n);
	12: Keyword	name = int
	12: Identifier	name = total
	12: Assign	name = =
	12: Identifier	name = sum_int
	12: Terminal	name = (
	12: Identifier	name = n
	12: Terminal	name = )
	12: Terminal	name = ;
13: ave =(total/ n);
	13: Identifier	name = ave
	13: Assign	name = =
	13: Terminal	name = (
	13: Identifier	name = total
	13: NumOp	name = /
	13: Identifier	name = n
	13: Terminal	name = )
	13: Terminal	name = ;
14: System.out( 'a','=',ave);
	14: Keyword	name = System
	14: Terminal	name = .
	14: Keyword	name = out
	14: Terminal	name = (
	14: CharConst	name = 'a'
	14: Terminal	name = ,
	14: CharConst	name = '='
	14: Terminal	name = ,
	14: Identifier	name = ave
	14: Terminal	name = )
	14: Terminal	name = ;
15: {
	15: Terminal	name = {
16: else System.out('ed','r','r','o','r');
	16: Keyword	name = else
	16: Keyword	name = System
	16: Terminal	name = .
	16: Keyword	name = out
	16: Terminal	name = (
	16: Error	name = Invalid character format ed
